name: serph-nft-redemption-portal
description: Project Overview   The SERPH NFT Redemption Portal is a luxury self-care themed web platform where users can:   ✔️ Track and redeem NFTs for herbal capsules, teas, and detergent bundles   ✔️ Monitor transactions and order tracking for SERPH Coin purchases   ✔️ Provide a seamless and immersive experience for NFT holders
